what: IBGE statistical grid access with R
title: IBGE statistical grid access with R
text: goal ‘gridbr’ provide easy access IBGE Statistical Grid (download available ). builds upon development made project IBGE Statistical Grid Compact Representation (short paper available ).

title: IBGE statistical grid access with R
text: can install development version gridbr GitHub repository devtools:

title: IBGE statistical grid access with R
text: gridbr_download main function available package. builds geometry IBGE statistical grid merge 2010 population census data. user must provide area interest (aoi) geospatial sf object. following example, Brazilian archipelago Fernando de Noronha used aoi. can download one line package geobr just using IBGE municipality code.  loading aoi, can use function gridbr_download download grid. Two arguments mandatory: input cellsize.  IBGE statistical grid made available following sizes: 500KM, 100KM, 50KM, 10KM, 5KM, 1KM 200M. Using different value result error. Retrieving population census data requires either internet connection support package gridbr.data. user meet requirements, output include cell’s id geometry, population census data. user meet requirements still don’t want download data, can specify setting census_data parameter FALSE. optional parameter related projection: default, output CRS input. want keep original grid CRS, equal area projection, must set equal_area parameter TRUE.
code: library(gridbr) library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.9.1, GDAL 3.4.2, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE library(geobr) aoi <- read_municipality(2605459) #> Using year 2010 #> Downloading: 10 B plot(st_geometry(aoi_grid)) plot(st_geometry(aoi), add = TRUE, border = "red") aoi_grid_1KM_id <- gridbr_download(aoi,                                     cellsize = "1KM", 1KME7381N10816 POLYGON ((-32.43194 -3.8873... aoi_grid_1KM_id <- gridbr_download(aoi,                                     cellsize = "1KM",                                     equal_area = TRUE) head(aoi_grid_1KM_id) #> Simple feature collection with 6 features and 5 fields #> Geometry type: POLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 7376000 ymin: 10816000 xmax: 7377000 ymax: what: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
text: Make IBGE statistical grid covering (input) merge population census data.

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
code: gridbr_download(input, cellsize, census_data = TRUE, equal_area = FALSE)

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
text: input object class sf, sfc sfg. cellsize target cell size. Must one : "500KM", "100KM", "50KM", "10KM", "5KM", "1KM" "200M". census_data logical. Set FALSE want include population census data. equal_area logical. Set TRUE want use original grid CRS equal area projection.

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download

what: A character vector with the id of IBGE statistical grid urban cells (
title: A character vector with the id of IBGE statistical grid urban cells (
text: character vector id IBGE statistical grid urban cells ("200M" cell size).
